title: PM Modi showcases India’s tech prowess during US visit: key takeaways
description: The prime minister also addressed the Indian American community about India’s Digital Public Infrastructure (DPI) and initiatives for domestic semiconductor production. The CEOs acknowledged India’s increasing prominence as a global technology hub, attributing this to its innovation-friendly policies and burgeoning market opportunities.
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, on a three-day visit to the US, has been highlighting India’s growth potential in the technology sector. Modi met with leading Silicon Valley CEOs and government officials to attract investment in the country’s startups and semiconductor industry.
